summary: This is an email chain from June 25, 2020, regarding the circulation of a revised draft indictment against Ghislaine Maxwell. It shows prosecutors coordinating final edits to the charging document.

persons.name: Craig A. Ca
persons.context: Appears as a recipient of the email regarding the revised Maxwell indictment draft, indicating involvement in the prosecution team.

events.title: Revised Maxwell Indictment Draft Circulated
events.description: Prosecutors circulate a revised draft of the indictment against Ghislaine Maxwell, incorporating recent edits.

keyFacts: A revised draft indictment against Ghislaine Maxwell was circulated among prosecutors on June 25, 2020.
The document indicates ongoing preparation and editing of the charging document by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
The email chain shows coordination within the prosecution team prior to the formal indictment.
